# Robin Pandey's Development Portfolio

A modern, responsive portfolio showcasing 9 production-ready web applications.

## Features

- 9 live applications with custom domains
- Category filtering (Web Platforms, E-commerce, Productivity, Education)
- Dark/Light theme toggle
- Mobile-responsive design
- Smooth animations and interactions
- GitHub Pages optimized

## Live Applications Showcased

1. **Apollo 18 Token Platform** - apollo18token.com
2. **Mirror Meditation Application** - mirrormeditationapp.netlify.app
3. **Apollo Soccer Academy Website** - apollosocceracademy.com
4. **Apollo Tunes Music Platform** - apollotunes.com
5. **EmbroidIt Custom Embroidery** - embroidit.us
6. **Apollo Technologies Business Site** - apollotechnologiesus.com
7. **OnlineMyBiz Business Portal** - onlinemybiz.net
8. **Apollo STEM Academy** - apolloat2022.github.io/ApolloStemAcademy
9. **To-Do Application** - todo-app-indol-seven-99.vercel.app

git clone https://github.com/robinpandey/portfolio.git
